NK045(bi)005:1: // gzhan stong khas len seng ge'i nga ro bzhugs so //
NK045(bi)005:2: na mo gu ru many+dzu sh+r+ai ye /
NK045(bi)005:3: rgyal ba mi yi seng ge nyi ma'i gnyen //
NK045(bi)005:4: byams chen byams ba thogs med brgyud pa dang //
NK045(bi)005:5: gangs can 'jigs med seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa //
NK045(bi)005:6: de dag kun la gus pas phyag 'tshal lo //
NK045(bi)005:7: rab 'byams sras bcas rgyal ba'i gsang ba'i mdzod //
NK045(bi)005:8: nges don mdo rgyud man ngag snying po'i bcud //
NK045(bi)005:9: 'phags bod mkhas grub du ma'i dgongs nyams phul //
NK045(bi)005:10: zab mo dbu ma'i khas len mdo tsam bshad //
NK045(bi)005:11: de la 'dir gzhan stong smra ba rnams kyis //
NK045(bi)005:12: rgyal ba'i bka' nges don 'khor lo tha ma phyir
NK045(bi)005:13: mi ldog pa 'jigs med rtag pa'i lam bstan pa
NK045(bi)005:14: rnams dang / rgyal tshab sa bcu'i dbang phyug gi gsung theg pa chen po rgyud bla ma dang /
NK045(bi)005:15: 'phags pa thogs med sku mched kyis gsungs pa'i zab don rnams dang /
NK045(bi)005:16: mgon po klu sgrub kyi bstod tshogs sogs mdo yi nges don gyi lung rnams dang /
NK045(bi)005:17: dpal dus kyi 'khor lo sogs sngags rgyud rnams dang /
NK045(bi)005:18: de'i dgongs 'grel gsal byed sems 'grel skor gsum sogs dgongs pa'i gnad gcig par /
NK045(bi)005:19: zab mo nges don dbu ma chen po'i gzhung 'dzug
NK045(bi)005:20: par mdzad pa 'di shin tu zab cing rgya che
NK045(bi)005:21: ba'i dgongs gnad can yin kyang /
NK045(bi)005:22: deng sang ni gzhung smra ba'i khur 'dzin pa shes
NK045(bi)005:23: mi shes thams cad kyi kha tho mchu tho ci
NK045(bi)005:24: phog byed pa ni shin tu 'khrul te /
NK045(bi)005:25: de'i tshul mdo tsam brjod na /
NK045(bi)005:26: gzhan stong gi grub mtha' nges par gtan la 'beb na /
NK045(bi)005:27: dang po mgon po klu sgrub kyi gzhung bzhin du
NK045(bi)005:28: chos thams cad rang bzhin med par gtan la 'bebs
NK045(bi)005:29: dgos te / de ma shes na kun rdzob rang ngo nas stong tshul dang /
NK045(bi)005:30: don dam gzhan gyis stong tshul gtan la mi pheb pas /
NK045(bi)005:31: thog mar spros bral so sor rang gis rig par bya ba'i don gtan la dbab par bya'o //
NK045(bi)005:32: de yi rjes su don dam spros pa dang bral
NK045(bi)005:33: ba'i don de lta bu ni yul can mi rtog
NK045(bi)005:34: ye shes kyis rtogs nas gnas snang mthun par gyur
NK045(bi)005:35: pa'i yul dang yul can gnyis ka la don dam
NK045(bi)005:37: gnas snang mi mthun pa'i yul yul can la kun rdzob ces bya ste /
NK045(bi)005:38: tha snyad dpyod pa'i tshad mas dpyad na bslu ba dang mi bslu ba /
NK045(bi)005:39: 'khrul pa dang ma 'khrul ba'i khyad yod pas /
NK045(bi)005:40: gang mi bslu zhing ma 'khrul ba de don dam dang /
NK045(bi)005:41: cig shos la kun rdzob kyi rnam bzhag byed de /
NK045(bi)005:42: bden gnyis 'jog tshul stong pa dang snang ba la bzhag pa yongs grags ltar dang /
NK045(bi)005:43: gnas snang mthun mi mthun la bzhag pa bshad ma
NK045(bi)005:44: thag pa ltar gnyis po 'di mdo dang bstan bcos
NK045(bi)005:45: chen po rnams las gdod nas bstan gyi /
NK045(bi)005:46: gzhan stong smra bas gsar du rnam bzhag byas pa ma yin te /
NK045(bi)005:47: chos dang chos nyid rnam 'byed las gsungs pa dang /
NK045(bi)005:49: rnam dbyer bcas pa'i mtshan nyid can //
NK045(bi)005:50: glo bur dag gi khams stong gi /
NK045(bi)005:51: rnam dbyer med pa'i mtshan nyid can //
NK045(bi)005:52: bla med chos kyis stong ma yin //
NK045(bi)005:55: de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ni /
NK045(bi)005:56: rnam par dbye ba yod pa /
NK045(bi)005:58: nyon mongs pa'i sbubs thams cad kyis stong pa yin la /
NK045(bi)005:59: rnam par dbye ba med pa /
NK045(bi)005:60: bral mi shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sangs
NK045(bi)005:61: rgyas kyi chos gang+g+aa'i klung gi byed ma las 'das
NK045(bi)005:64: shing rta chen po 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis /
NK045(bi)005:65: ji ltar me yis dag pa'i gos //
NK045(bi)005:66: sna tshogs dri mas dri ma can //
NK045(bi)005:67: ji ltar me yi nang bcug na //
NK045(bi)005:68: dri ma tshig 'gyur gos min ltar //
NK045(bi)005:69: de bzhin 'od gsal ba yi sems //
NK045(bi)005:70: 'dod chags la sogs dri ma can //
NK045(bi)005:71: ye shes me yis dri ma bsregs //
NK045(bi)005:72: de nyid 'od gsal ma yin no //
NK045(bi)005:73: stong pa nyid ni ston pa'i mdo //
NK045(bi)005:74: rgyal bas ji snyed gsungs pa gang //
NK045(bi)005:75: de dag kun gyis nyon mongs ldog /
NK045(bi)005:76: khams de nyams par byed ma yin //
NK045(bi)005:78: chos kyi rgyal po rigs ldan 'jam dpal grags pas /
NK045(bi)005:79: phung po rnam dpyad stong pa nyid //
NK045(bi)005:80: chu shing bzhin du snying po med //
NK045(bi)005:81: rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa'i //
NK045(bi)005:82: stong nyid de dang 'dra ma yin //
NK045(bi)005:84: de lta na don dam rang ngos nas mi stong
NK045(bi)005:85: zhes zer ba 'di rnam pa kun tu bden gnyis
NK045(bi)005:86: phyi ma'i 'jog tshul ltar byas te /
NK045(bi)005:87: bden ba gnyis po gcig bkag pa'i tha dad du khas len pa la go dgos kyi /
NK045(bi)005:88: snang stong gi bden gnyis ngo bo gcig la ldog
NK045(bi)005:89: pa tha dad kyi 'jog tshul ltar go ba de
NK045(bi)005:90: gtan min no // de lta na gnas snang mi mthun pa 'khrul ba'i snang ba rnams ni /
NK045(bi)005:92: don la de ltar ma grub pa'i phyir kun rdzob ces bya la /
NK045(bi)005:93: cig shos ni ma 'khrul ba'i gzigs ngor snang ba
NK045(bi)005:94: ltar grub pa la tshad mas gnod pa med pa'i
NK045(bi)005:95: phyir don dam du yod pa dang bden par grub
NK045(bi)005:96: pa zhes bya'o // 'di stong pa las tha dad
NK045(bi)005:97: du gyur pa'i snang ba bden grub yin mi dgos
NK045(bi)005:98: pa zhes bya'o // te / dang po nas chos
NK045(bi)005:99: kyi dbyings snang stong zung 'jug rnam kun mchog ldan
NK045(bi)005:100: gyi stong nyid du grub zin nas /
NK045(bi)005:101: de lta bu gnas lugs don dam bden par khas blangs zin pa'i phyir ro //
NK045(bi)005:102: des na de 'dra'i don dam de rang ngos nas mi stong ste /
NK045(bi)005:103: tha snyad du dper bya na thag khra lta bu don dam bden pa /
NK045(bi)005:104: sbrul lta bu kun rdzob bden par bzhag dgos te /
NK045(bi)005:105: gcig tha snyad du grub pa dang /
NK045(bi)005:106: gcig ma grub pa'i khyad phyed dgos kyi gnyis ka 'khrul ba dang /
NK045(bi)005:107: gnyis ka bden pa yin mi srid pa bzhin no //
NK045(bi)005:108: des na don dam rang gi ngo bos mi stong
NK045(bi)005:109: ste don dam ma 'khrul ba'i yul yul can gnyis
NK045(bi)005:111: yod pa de la de ltar ma yin pa'i tshad mas gnod pa mi srid pa dang /
NK045(bi)005:112: stong nyid bsgrub pa'i rigs pa sngon du btang bas grub don yin pa dang /
NK045(bi)005:113: tha snyad bden pa dpyod pa'i tshang ma yang dag pas grub pa la /
NK045(bi)005:114: lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten sus kyang chos bzhin rgol mi nus so //
NK045(bi)005:115: de ltar na don dam rang ngos nas bden pa dang mi bslu ba yin pa'i phyir /
NK045(bi)005:116: de ltar yin pa'i chos kyis nam yang mi stong ste /
NK045(bi)005:117: stong na mi bden pa dang 'khrul bar 'jog pa'i
NK045(bi)005:118: tshad ma yod dgos na de mi srid pa'i phyir
NK045(bi)005:119: ro // gal te srid na zhi ba mya ngan
NK045(bi)005:120: 'das pa ni yid brtan gyi gnas ma yin par
NK045(bi)005:121: 'gyur dgos na de lta bu khas len pa ni
NK045(bi)005:122: bdud dang mu stegs pa tshad ma dang mi ldan
NK045(bi)005:123: pa'i smra ba can rnams las bstan pa 'di la
NK045(bi)005:124: gus pa dag gis smra ba ma yin no //
NK045(bi)005:125: gnas lugs don dam de ltar ye nas yin kyang /
NK045(bi)005:126: de ltar ma rtogs pa'i 'khrul snang gang zhig mi
NK045(bi)005:127: bden pa dang 'khrul ba nyid du bsgrub pa'i tshad
NK045(bi)005:128: ma yod pa can ni skabs 'dir kun rdzob ces
NK045(bi)005:129: bya ste sgrib pa'i don can gyi ming gi don
NK045(bi)005:130: dang mthun pa'o // des na don dam kun rdzob des stong ste /
NK045(bi)005:131: kun rdzob kyi ming can 'khrul snang gis bsdus pa'i
NK045(bi)005:132: yul dang yul can de dag rang gi ngo bos
NK045(bi)005:133: stong ste / dper na thag pa la sbrul gyis stong pa bzhin no //
NK045(bi)005:134: de ltar shin tu yang khas blangs dgos te /
NK045(bi)005:135: gzhan stong dgag pa skad byed pa'i grub mtha' gzhan ma'i lugs ltar na /
NK045(bi)005:136: bden med ni don dam dpyod pas bsgrub bya yin gyi dgag byar khas len mi rung ba ltar /
NK045(bi)005:137: spros bral ni mthar thug dpyod pa'i rigs pas bsgrub bya yin gyi dgag bya ma yin pa'i /
NK045(bi)005:138: bden med dang spros pa med pa'i khas len med
NK045(bi)005:139: na rang lugs kyi grub mtha' 'di yin zhes cung
NK045(bi)005:140: zad kyang sgrub tu med par 'gyur ba ltar /
NK045(bi)005:141: don dam pa yang kun rdzob dang 'dra bar rang
NK045(bi)005:142: stong yin na don dam ma 'khrul ba dang gnas
NK045(bi)005:144: kun rdzob 'khrul ba dang de'i ngo bor ma grub par bzhag mi shes te /
NK045(bi)005:145: 'di'i skabs kyi stong zhes pa stong gzhi gang la
NK045(bi)005:146: chos gang gis stong dpyad pa'i skabs yin pa'i phyir
NK045(bi)005:147: ro // gal te don dam rang ngo nas stong
NK045(bi)005:148: na 'khrul snang dang ma 'khrul ba'i snang ba la
NK045(bi)005:149: bden rdzun dpyod pa'i tshad mas khegs ma khegs kyi
NK045(bi)005:151: thag pa dang sbrul gnyis ka yod mnyam med mnyam du 'gyur ba bzhin no //
NK045(bi)005:152: kun rdzob kyis stong pa des stong go nges par chod de /
NK045(bi)005:153: bden grub de ma grub pas bden 'dzin de 'khrul
NK045(bi)005:154: shes yin pas bslu zhing 'khor bar 'khyams pa yin
NK045(bi)005:155: pas / de 'dra'i 'khrul ba'i yul yul can gnyis
NK045(bi)005:156: ka skabs 'di'i kun rdzob yin pas des stong par
NK045(bi)005:157: gyur pas stong go ma chod na bden grub med
NK045(bi)005:158: pas kyang stong go mi chod pa dang /
NK045(bi)005:159: bden 'dzin khegs pas stong nyid bsgom pa'i go mi chod par 'gyur ro //
NK045(bi)005:160: de bzhin du spros pa'i yul yul can khegs pa'i
NK045(bi)005:161: dbang gis gzung 'dzin med pa'i stong nyid kyang lugs
NK045(bi)005:162: 'di la yongs su rdzogs pa yin te /
NK045(bi)005:163: gzung 'dzin gnyis snang gi spros pa thams cad 'khrul
NK045(bi)005:164: ba'i yul dang yul can gyis bsdus pa yin pas
NK045(bi)005:165: skabs 'di'i kun rdzob tu bzhag pa des /
NK045(bi)005:166: don dam pa stong pas stong go ma chod na /
NK045(bi)005:167: spros bral gyis stong go mi chod pa dang /
NK045(bi)005:168: spros bral bsgom pa'i blo des stong nyid bsgom pa'i go mi chod par 'gyur ro //
NK045(bi)005:169: 'o na don dam de bden med dang spros bral ma yin nam zhe na /
NK045(bi)005:170: de bden med dang spros bral ma yin pa zhig
NK045(bi)005:171: don dam kyang ga la yin te skabs 'di'i kun
NK045(bi)005:172: rdzob bzhin no // 'o na don dam bden med dang stong pa yin na /
NK045(bi)005:173: bden grub dang rang ngos mi stong zhes ces smra snyam na /
NK045(bi)005:174: skabs 'di'i bden grub dang mi stong ba ni tha
NK045(bi)005:175: snyad dpyod pa'i tshad ma'i ngor grub pa dang yod
NK045(bi)005:176: pa la brjod pa'i don khyed cag gis gtan ma
NK045(bi)005:177: go bar rgol ba tsam du zad do //
NK045(bi)005:178: 'o na bden grub kyang yin la bden grub med pa'ang yin /
NK045(bi)005:179: stong nyid kyang yin la mi stong ba'ang yin par khas len nam zhe na /
NK045(bi)005:180: de ga la yin te khyod snang ba la kun rdzob dang /
NK045(bi)005:181: stong pa la don dam du bzhag pa'i ya gyal gyi /
NK045(bi)005:182: don dam dpyod pa'i tshe na bden med dang spros bral dgag mi rung bar 'dod pa ltar /
NK045(bi)005:183: nged 'khrul ba kun rdzob dang ma 'khrul ba don
NK045(bi)005:184: dam du 'dod pa'i lugs la'ang ma 'khrul ba'i don
NK045(bi)005:185: dam dang / de ma 'khrul ba'i bden par grub
NK045(bi)005:186: pa dgag mi rung bar 'dod pa 'dra ba'i phyir
NK045(bi)005:187: dam dang / ro // de'i phyir shing rta chen po thogs med kyi zhal nas /
NK045(bi)005:188: gang la gang med pa de ni des stong ngo //
NK045(bi)005:189: 'di la lhag mar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni yod do //
NK045(bi)005:190: zhes gsungs pa ltar rnam pa kun tu dgag sgrub
NK045(bi)005:191: kyi gzhung 'dzugs pa'i tshe rigs pas ma grub pa
NK045(bi)005:192: bkag dgos kyang / rigs pas grub pa'i don mi
NK045(bi)005:193: dgag par khas len dgos kyi thams cad mtshungs par
NK045(bi)005:194: bkag na rjod byed chos dang brjod bya'i don yang
NK045(bi)005:195: dag yin pa dang min pa'i khyad par sgrub byed
NK045(bi)005:196: kyi tshad ma log pa'i phyir nges shes gang yang
NK045(bi)005:198: 'o na dgag sgrub las 'das pa'i chos dbyings so
NK045(bi)005:199: so rang rig pa'i yul khas mi len nam snyam
NK045(bi)005:200: na / ci'i phyir zhes kho rang la 'dri bar bya'o //
NK045(bi)005:201: khyod mtha' gcig tu dgag bya 'gog pa dang /
NK045(bi)005:202: bsgrub bya sgrub pa'i khas len dang bcas pa'i gzhung
NK045(bi)005:203: btsug nas thams cad dgag par mi 'dod pa'i dmigs
NK045(bi)005:204: pa can gyi sa la gnas pa'i phyir zhe na
NK045(bi)005:205: / so so rang rig pa'i yul gyi chos dbyings dgag sgrub las 'das pa'i phyir /
NK045(bi)005:206: 'di lta bu la bdag cag gis don dam du 'dod pa yin la /
NK045(bi)005:207: de 'dra'i don dam grub zin de nyid don dam
NK045(bi)005:208: du grub pa yin par tha snyad kyis bsgrub pa'i
NK045(bi)005:209: skabs 'dir dgag sgrub can du byas pa 'di gnyis
NK045(bi)005:211: gal te don dam tha snyad du rang ngos mi stong par sgrub pa'i khas len 'di med na /
NK045(bi)005:212: dgag sgrub bral ba'i don dam kyang med par 'gyur ro //
NK045(bi)005:213: de'i phyir tha snyad du rang bzhin med pa'i khas
NK045(bi)005:214: len log na rang bzhin yod pa nyid du grub
NK045(bi)005:216: don dam rang ngos nas stong ste de ltar ma grub par gyur na /
NK045(bi)005:217: don dam de don dam ma yin par kun rdzob tu 'gyur ro //
NK045(bi)005:218: gal te de ltar don dam rang gi ngos nas
NK045(bi)005:219: bden grub dang spros pa thams cad med par grub
NK045(bi)005:220: zin des stong nyid kyi go ma chod par don
NK045(bi)005:221: dam rang ngos mi stong zhes pa'i tha snyad kyi
NK045(bi)005:222: 'jog mtshams kyi tshig tsam des stong nyid dngos por
NK045(bi)005:223: zhen pa'i gsor mi rung ba'i lta bar gyur pa
NK045(bi)005:224: dang / srid zhi mnyam nyid min par don dam
NK045(bi)005:225: rkyang pa rtag pa ther zug tu gyur pa sogs
NK045(bi)005:226: kyi skyon du 'gyur snyam pa ni grub mtha' chen
NK045(bi)005:227: po 'di'i phyogs mgo tsam yang ma go ba ste
NK045(bi)005:228: dang / / stong nyid bden med spros bral du
NK045(bi)005:229: khas blang bzhin de la bden grub dang spros pa
NK045(bi)005:230: dang / / ji ltar yod / don dam don
NK045(bi)005:231: dam du grub par brjod tsam de kun rdzob min
NK045(bi)005:232: par bstan pa'i sgo nas stong mi stong gi tha
NK045(bi)005:233: snyad byed pa de skabs 'di'i bsgrub bya yin pas
NK045(bi)005:234: tha snyad du de ltar khas blangs pas stong nyid
NK045(bi)005:235: dngos por dmigs pa'i lta ba can du 'gyur na
NK045(bi)005:236: dang / / ji ltar yod / / bden med
NK045(bi)005:237: khas blangs pas stong nyid dngos por med pa'i mtshan
NK045(bi)005:238: mar zhen pa'i gsor mi rung ba'i lta bar 'gyur
NK045(bi)005:239: dang / / ji ltar yod / / ba dang
NK045(bi)005:240: / spros bral khas blangs pas stong nyid ni brjod
NK045(bi)005:241: du med pa'i dngos por dmigs pa'i gsor mi rung
NK045(bi)005:242: ba'i lta bar 'gyur ba mtshungs so //
NK045(bi)005:243: mdor na skabs 'di'i don dam dang kun rdzob kyi gdags gzhi ni /
NK045(bi)005:244: 'khrul ba med pa dang 'khrul ba'i yul yul can so so la 'dzin cing /
NK045(bi)005:245: ma 'khrul ba'i don dam de blo ma 'khrul ba'i
NK045(bi)005:246: yul du yod pa dang bden pa dang de nyid
NK045(bi)005:247: kun rdzob 'khrul pa'i phyogs kyis stong par khas len
NK045(bi)005:248: la / tha snyad du rang ngos ni mi stong ste 'phags pa'i gzigs ngor yod par 'dod do //
NK045(bi)005:249: don dam rang ngos nas stong na de kun rdzob kyi stong gzhir bzhag tu med par 'gyur la /
NK045(bi)005:250: de lta na 'phags pa'i mnyam bzhag gi yul du
NK045(bi)005:251: chos gang yod pa dang med pa'i khyad par bzhag
NK045(bi)005:252: mi shes pas / don dam don dam min pa dang /
NK045(bi)005:253: kun rdzob kun rdzob min par don dam dang mgo mnyam par 'gyur ro //
NK045(bi)005:254: des na rnam pa kun tu khas len 'di ltar ma byas na mi rung zhing /
NK045(bi)005:255: de la skyon ci brjod pa thams cad stong nyid
NK045(bi)005:256: bden med spros bral du smra ba rnams la ji
NK045(bi)005:258: 'khor 'das gnyis yod pa dang med pa'i sgo nas
NK045(bi)005:259: tha dad du song ba'i srid zhi mnyam nyid med
NK045(bi)005:261: 'khrul ba'i 'khor ba dang ma 'khrul ba'i myang 'das
NK045(bi)005:262: gnyis ka yin pa tha snyad du nam yang mi
NK045(bi)005:263: srid la / 'khor bar snang yang de ltar ma grub par /
NK045(bi)005:264: 'khor ba'i rang bzhin gdod nas dag pa'i don dam
NK045(bi)005:265: myang 'das chen por gnas pa nyid skabs 'di'i bsgrub
NK045(bi)005:266: bya yin pas de la srid zhi mnyam nyid ces
NK045(bi)005:267: brjod kyi / su'i lugs la'ang chos thams cad don
NK045(bi)005:268: dam pa'i dbyings nyid du ye nas gnas pa la
NK045(bi)005:269: srid zhi mnyam nyid zhes brjod kyi /
NK045(bi)005:270: 'khor ba myang 'das kyi gzhi mthun khas len pa med do //
NK045(bi)005:271: gzhan yang don dam pa don dam pas mi stong
NK045(bi)005:272: ste don dam pa don dam pa rang gis stong
NK045(bi)005:273: na don dam de don dam min par kun rdzob
NK045(bi)005:275: de ltar smras pa la shin tu brgol bar 'dod pa rnams nyon cig /
NK045(bi)005:276: khyed cag gis bum pa bum pas mi stong bum
NK045(bi)005:277: pa bden grub kyis stong ngo zhes ma smras sam
NK045(bi)005:278: / de ltar na tha snyad du yod pa'i chos
NK045(bi)005:279: thams cad rang stong min par gzhan bden grub kyis
NK045(bi)005:280: stong par khas len rigs na /
NK045(bi)005:281: don dam don dam gyis mi stong par khas blang
NK045(bi)005:282: ba 'thad pa da nga bcas par khyed cag gis
NK045(bi)005:283: khas blangs so // don dam don dam gyis ma
NK045(bi)005:284: stong na bden grub kyis mi stong bar 'gyur ro
NK045(bi)005:285: khas blangs so // zhe na / bum pa sogs la'ang mtshungs so //
NK045(bi)005:286: des na nged kyi don dam don dam gyis mi
NK045(bi)005:287: stong kyang kun rdzob kyis stong pa'i phyir 'khrul snang
NK045(bi)005:288: rdzun pa bden pa grub pa lta ci smos kyi
NK045(bi)005:289: kun rdzob gnyis snang thams cad kyis stong par khas
NK045(bi)005:290: blangs pas stong go ma chod na /
NK045(bi)005:291: kun rdzob gnyis snang thams cad kyis ma stong par
NK045(bi)005:292: bden grub yan gar ba kun btags kyi spyod yul
NK045(bi)005:293: khegs pas stong go ji ltar chod /
NK045(bi)005:294: bden grub khegs kyang bden med mi khegs mi 'gog bkag mi rung bar 'dod pa ltar /
NK045(bi)005:295: kun rdzob 'khrul pa rnams khegs kyang don dam ma
NK045(bi)005:296: 'khrul ba mi khegs mi 'gog bkag mi rung bar
NK045(bi)005:297: mtshungs so // mdor na khyod kyis bden med sgrub
NK045(bi)005:298: pa'i rigs pas kun rdzob ma bkag pas stong gzhi
NK045(bi)005:299: kun rdzob tu song bas don dam pa kun rdzob
NK045(bi)005:300: kyis ma stong bar khas blang /
NK045(bi)005:301: bdag cag gis stong gzhi don dam kun rdzob kyis stong par khas blang bas /
NK045(bi)005:302: stong gzhi bden med med dgag la bden grub kyis stong pa'i stong pa phyang chad dang /
NK045(bi)005:303: rang ngos nas ma stong pa'i kun rdzob kyi snang
NK045(bi)005:304: ba phyang chad bden grub yan gar bas stong pa'i
NK045(bi)005:305: / stong gzhi snang stong gnyis zung du nam yang
NK045(bi)005:306: 'dre ba med par gnas pa srid zhi mnyam nyid
NK045(bi)005:307: bden pa gnyis kyi ngos nas nam yang mi srid
NK045(bi)005:308: / do // des na de 'dra ba spros la gnad du khel bar gyis shig /
NK045(bi)005:309: nged kyi lugs la yul stong pa nyid dang /
NK045(bi)005:310: yul can ye shes gnyis ka don dam yin cing /
NK045(bi)005:311: de gnyis yang dag pa'i don du snang stong bden
NK045(bi)005:312: gnyis tha dad med pas don dam pa'i chos kyi
NK045(bi)005:313: dbyings ni stong pa phyang chad ma yin te /
NK045(bi)005:314: rnam dbyer med pa'i sku dang ye shes kyis mi
NK045(bi)005:315: stong par ye nas lhun gyis grub pa'i ngo bo
NK045(bi)005:317: khyod kyi don dam med dgag phyang chad ni tha
NK045(bi)005:318: snyad kyi snang ba las tha dad du gyur pa'i
NK045(bi)005:320: sku dang ye shes kyi cha tsam yang sngar med phyis med nam yang med /
NK045(bi)005:321: de dang tha dad du gyur pa'i kun rdzob rnams
NK045(bi)005:322: yod kyang des stong pa la mi phan te rang
NK045(bi)005:323: rang so so nam yang mi 'dre 'dre mi rung
NK045(bi)005:324: ba yin / de lta na 'khor rtsa bden 'dzin de'i yul med pas /
NK045(bi)005:325: de 'dre'i yul yul can gnyis ka kun rdzob 'khrul ba yin pas /
NK045(bi)005:326: khyod kyi lugs la kun rdzob ni bden grub dang bden 'dzin kho na la 'jog dgos so //
NK045(bi)005:327: tha snyad kyi snang ba rnams ni don dam pa min te stong pa nyid min pa'i phyir dang /
NK045(bi)005:328: kun rdzob min te ma 'khrul ba'i snang ba'am don dam dpyod pa'i dpyad bzod yin pa'i phyir te /
NK045(bi)005:329: bden grub tu dpyad bzod min yang tha snyad rang ngos mi stong ba'i dpyad bzod yin pa'i phyir /
NK045(bi)005:330: de lta na bden med dang tha snyad thams cad don dam du 'gyur ro //
NK045(bi)005:331: bden grub 'ba' zhig kun rdzob tu 'gyur ro //
NK045(bi)005:332: bden 'dzin ni rdzas su yod pas bum sogs dang 'dra'o //
NK045(bi)005:333: yul bden snang dang yul can bden 'dzin gnyis gnas snang mi mthun pa'i kun rdzob /
NK045(bi)005:334: bden med dang bden med du 'dzin pa gnyis ka
NK045(bi)005:335: gnas snang mthun pa'i don dam du 'dod rigs kyi
NK045(bi)005:336: / gnyis snang med pa'i yul yul can gnyis ka la don dam dang /
NK045(bi)005:337: de yod pa kun rdzob tu 'jog pa'i lugs khas len mi rigs te /
NK045(bi)005:338: bum sogs rang ngo nas mi stong na gnyis snang
NK045(bi)005:339: yod pa dang gnyis 'dzin gyi blo gnas snang mthun
NK045(bi)005:340: pa'i yul yul can du 'gyur la /
NK045(bi)005:341: gnyis snang med pa dang gnyis 'dzin med pa gnas snang mi mthun pa'i 'khrul shes su 'gyur ro //
NK045(bi)005:342: mdor na khyod kyi lugs la rigs pas dgag bya bden grub 'ba' zhig yin pas /
NK045(bi)005:343: stong nyid bsgom pas spang bya ni bden snang dang
NK045(bi)005:344: bden 'dzin kho na yin gyi gzhan gang yang min
NK045(bi)005:345: na / 'phags slob kyi mnyam bzhag la bden grub
NK045(bi)005:346: kyis stong pa'i kun rdzob thams cad cis mi snang
NK045(bi)005:347: na / / rigs pas dgag bya min yang lam gyis bkag ste mi snang ngo zhe na /
NK045(bi)005:348: sgrib shing 'dra ba'i lam des yod pa'i dngos po rnams mi snang bar byas nas /
NK045(bi)005:349: med pa'i don snang na gang phyir yod pa mi mthong med mthong bas /
NK045(bi)005:350: 'di 'dra'i mun nag rnam pa de gang zhig /
NK045(bi)005:351: zhes pa lta bu'i lam de ya mtshan no //
NK045(bi)005:352: nged kyi lugs la don dam pa mngon du gzigs pa'i tshe /
NK045(bi)005:353: yul dang yul can gnyis su snang ba med pa'i mi rtog ye shes kyi spyod yul yin pas /
NK045(bi)005:354: de la bden snang dang bden 'dzin ji ltar mnga' /
NK045(bi)005:355: spros pa'i yul dang spros pa ji ltar mnga' /
NK045(bi)005:356: de lta bu la don dam du gdags par byas nas /
NK045(bi)005:357: ma 'khrul ba'i don dam de stong gzhir bzung nas /
NK045(bi)005:358: de la 'khrul snang 'khor ba kun rdzob phyogs kyi
NK045(bi)005:359: yul dang yul can gyis stong pa yin zhes bya'o
NK045(bi)005:360: // don dam ngo bo spros pa las 'das kyang /
NK045(bi)005:361: don dam pa sgrub tshe don dam gang yin dang /
NK045(bi)005:362: kun rdzob phyes nas 'khrul dang ma 'khrul ba'i //
NK045(bi)005:363: khas len 'di ltar ma byas cir mi rung //
NK045(bi)005:364: rang bzhin med pas chos kun spros bral kyang //
NK045(bi)005:365: spros bral bkag nas med dgag nan sgrub rnams //
NK045(bi)005:366: rang bzhin med pa mtha' gcig khas len zhes //
NK045(bi)005:367: tshig 'a di tsam zhig grub mtha'i skyabs su bzung //
NK045(bi)005:368: de ltar bzung tshe don dam rang ngos nas //
NK045(bi)005:369: mi stong zhes pa'i khas len de dag kyang //
NK045(bi)005:370: mi 'dod bzhin du bden med khas blangs pa'i //
NK045(bi)005:371: tshul des khas len ma byas rang dbang med //
NK045(bi)005:372: don dam rang ngos mi stong smras pa na //
NK045(bi)005:373: don dam don dam nyid du grub pas legs //
NK045(bi)005:374: bum pa rang ngos mi stong zhes smras na //
NK045(bi)005:375: chos kun mi stong rtag par lta ba dang //
NK045(bi)005:376: nyi tshi'i stong pa'i stong pa dngos med po //
NK045(bi)005:377: cha gnyis 'dzin pa'i rtag chad lta gzhi sgrubs //
NK045(bi)005:378: don dam rtag dang bden dang mi stong zhes //
NK045(bi)005:379: tha snyad tshad mas grub cing de shes na //
NK045(bi)005:380: lam gyi yon tan kun 'dzin rtag chad kyi //
NK045(bi)005:381: mtha' la zhen pa'i lta ba ngan pa 'gog /
NK045(bi)005:382: rtag chad rtag lta chad tshad chad lta min //
NK045(bi)005:383: yod tshad yod mtha' med tshad med mtha' min //
NK045(bi)005:384: zhes su gangs can mkhas par grags rnams bzhed //
NK045(bi)005:385: de bzhin tha snyad tshad mas legs dpyad na //
NK045(bi)005:386: rtag dang mi rtag stong dang mi stong dang //
NK045(bi)005:387: bden dang mi bden yod med khyad yod pa //
NK045(bi)005:388: de dag mtha' min shan 'byed blo yis rtogs //
NK045(bi)005:389: mthar thug don dam dpyod pa'i ye shes la //
NK045(bi)005:390: yod med la sogs spros pa mi mnga' bar //
NK045(bi)005:391: gzhan stong smra ba'i mkhas grub kun gyis bzhed //
NK045(bi)005:392: khyod kyis don dam dpyod pa'i dpyad ngor yang //
NK045(bi)005:393: bden med spros pa yod ces khas len mdzad //
NK045(bi)005:394: don dam dpyod pa'i dpyad ngor yod gyur cing //
NK045(bi)005:395: don dam gzigs pa'i yul du gang yod pa //
NK045(bi)005:396: de dag mi stong pa dang bden grub dang //
NK045(bi)005:397: de ltar dmigs par bshad na 'gal ba ci //
NK045(bi)005:398: bden med gzigs ngor bden med stong gyur na //
NK045(bi)005:399: bden med ma gzigs pa dang khyad par ci //
NK045(bi)005:400: bden med de yang stong par gzigs snyam na //
NK045(bi)005:401: bum sogs stong par gzigs na mi rung ci //
NK045(bi)005:402: bum sogs bden pas stong gi rang mi stong //
NK045(bi)005:403: stong na bum sogs tha snyad du med na //
NK045(bi)005:404: don dam gzigs ngor don dam mi stong ba //
NK045(bi)005:405: de yang de dang 'dra bar cis mi 'gyur //
NK045(bi)005:406: mdor na don dam rang ngos mi stong zhes pa'i don ci yin zhes 'dri na /
NK045(bi)005:407: don dam bden pa don dam bden pas mi stong pa'i don yin ces smra'o //
NK045(bi)005:409: de lta na don dam bden grub tu 'gyur zhe na /
NK045(bi)005:410: bum pa bum pas mi stong na bum pa bden grub tu 'gyur ro //
NK045(bi)005:412: bum pa bum pas stong na bum pa de bum
NK045(bi)005:413: pa min par 'gyur bas bum pa tha snyad du
NK045(bi)005:414: med par mi 'gyur ram zhe na /
NK045(bi)005:417: dom dam bden pa don dam bden pas stong na /
NK045(bi)005:418: don dam bden pa don dam bden pa min par 'gyur zhing /
NK045(bi)005:419: don dam pa tha snyad du yang med par 'gyur ba mtshungs so //
NK045(bi)005:420: des na don dam dpyod pas rigs shes la bden
NK045(bi)005:421: med dang spros bral dang stong nyid dang don dam
NK045(bi)005:422: rnams bsgrub byar khas len gyi dgag byar khas len
NK045(bi)005:424: bden med sogs de dag yin ces mtha' gcig tu khas len dgos kyi /
NK045(bi)005:425: min zhes khas mi len pa des /
NK045(bi)005:426: don dam dang stong pa nyid ni bden pa dang
NK045(bi)005:427: yod pa dang mi stong par khas len dgos kyi
NK045(bi)005:428: / mi bden pa dang med pa dang stong ngo zhes khas mi len no //
NK045(bi)005:429: don dam gzigs pa'i mnyam bzhag gi ye shes kyis /
NK045(bi)005:430: bden med sogs gong gi de rnams gzigs pa dang 'dzin pa dang /
NK045(bi)005:431: de'i yul du yod pa dang bden par khas len dgos pa des na /
NK045(bi)005:432: ye shes des de dag mi gzigs mi 'dzin de'i
NK045(bi)005:433: yul du med de'i ngor mi bden ces khas len
NK045(bi)005:435: don dam stong pa nyid ni 'phags pa'i gzigs ngor /
NK045(bi)005:436: yod pa dang bden par grub pa sogs su'ang khas len no //
NK045(bi)005:437: bden grub tu khas blang na stong nyid la bden zhen mi 'gog go zhe na /
NK045(bi)005:438: de la tha snyad du bden zhen bkag mi rung
NK045(bi)005:439: ste bden don la bden par grub bo snyam pa
NK045(bi)005:440: rigs pa dang lam gyis 'gog rgyu'i bden zhen ma
NK045(bi)005:441: yin te bden med la bden med du 'dzin pa
NK045(bi)005:442: dgag bya ma yin pa bzhin no //
NK045(bi)005:443: don dam dpyad bzod kyi bden grub ni 'di'i skabs su dpyad dgos pa min te /
NK045(bi)005:444: don dam nyid bsgrub pa'i rigs pas sngar nas gtan la phab zin yin pa dang /
NK045(bi)005:445: kun rdzob kyis stong par bshad pa'i khongs su bden grub kyis stong pa 'dus ba'i phyir ro //
NK045(bi)005:446: de'i phyir khyed cag bden med la bden grub med
NK045(bi)005:447: kyang bden med du 'dzin pa nam yang bkag mi
NK045(bi)005:449: don dam pa la don dam dpyod pa'i dpyad bzod kyi chos kyis stong yang /
NK045(bi)005:450: don dam pa nyid bden par grub pa dang /
NK045(bi)005:451: rang gi ngo bos mi stong par 'dzin pa bkag mi rung ba rnam pa kun tu mtshungs so //
NK045(bi)005:452: don dam dpyod pas dpyad na dpyad bzod pa dang /
NK045(bi)005:453: des mi khegs pa'i chos don dam pa grub pa gang yang khas mi len bzhin du /
NK045(bi)005:454: bden grub 'ba' zhig don dam dpyod pa'i rigs shes kyis dgag bya dang /
NK045(bi)005:455: mi rtog ye shes kyis spang bya yin par 'dod kyi /
NK045(bi)005:456: chos su dmigs pa thams cad de gnyis kas dgag
NK045(bi)005:457: bya dang spang bya yin par 'dod na ha shang
NK045(bi)005:458: gi lta ba ltar shin tu mi rung bar smra
NK045(bi)005:459: ba de dag gi ltar na /
NK045(bi)005:460: rigs shes ye shes gnyis kas gnyis snang gi kun rdzob dgag pa dang spang bar byed kyi /
NK045(bi)005:461: kun rdzob kyis stong pa'i yul don dam pa dang /
NK045(bi)005:463: ye shes kyis gzigs pa'i chos gang zhig don dam
NK045(bi)005:464: du 'gyur ba rnams mi dgag mi spong bar gyur
NK045(bi)005:466: dmigs pa thams cad dus thams cad du dgag bya dang spang byar bzung na /
NK045(bi)005:467: ji lta ba dang ji snyed pa'i chos rnams thams
NK045(bi)005:468: cad rigs pa dang lam gyi dgag byar song bas
NK045(bi)005:469: ci yang med pa'i chad stong nam mkha' ltar 'gyur
NK045(bi)005:470: ro // des na gzhan stong smra bas bzhag pa'i
NK045(bi)005:471: khas len 'di dag la than du lta ba'i gangs
NK045(bi)005:472: can pa thams cad kyi yang /
NK045(bi)005:473: rang gi khas blang de dag gis mi 'dod bzhin
NK045(bi)005:474: du gzhan stong gi khas len thams cad rang grub
NK045(bi)005:475: tu song ngo // de'i phyir yod tshad dang med tshad /
NK045(bi)005:476: bden tshad dang mi stong tshad mtha' yin pa dang /
NK045(bi)005:477: de 'dzin pa'i blo thams cad mthar 'dzin du mi 'gro ste /
NK045(bi)005:478: bcom ldan 'das kyis yod pa'ang yod par /
NK045(bi)005:479: med pa'ang med par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
NK045(bi)005:481: rjes thob shan 'byed pa'i shes rab kyis /
NK045(bi)005:482: yod tshul med tshul bden par grub pa dang ma grub pa /
NK045(bi)005:483: stong pa dang mi stong pa sogs legs par shan phyes nas rnam par bzhag pa 'di dag /
NK045(bi)005:484: tha snyad ma 'dres sor 'byed pa'i ji snyed pa'i
NK045(bi)005:485: don la dpyod pa'i tshad mas 'grub pa yin pas
NK045(bi)005:487: mi mchog skyob pa sh+aakya seng ge yis /
NK045(bi)005:488: mi bsnyengs 'khor la seng ge'i sgra bsgrags pa'i //
NK045(bi)005:489: nges don snying po mthar thug 'di kho nar //
NK045(bi)005:490: nges pa snyed rnams mi ldog lung bstan 'tshengs //
NK045(bi)005:491: sa bcu'i dbang phyug rgyal tshab ma pham dang //
NK045(bi)005:492: 'phags pa'i sar bzhugs klu sgrub thogs med kyi //
NK045(bi)005:493: dgongs pa'i chu klung ye shes klong du gcig /
NK045(bi)005:494: 'gal 'dur mthong ba rang blo'i skyon du zad //
NK045(bi)005:495: chos kun ngo bo stong pa yin mod kyi //
NK045(bi)005:496: rang bzhin 'od gsal sku dang ye shes khams //
NK045(bi)005:497: ye nas lhun grub nyi dang zer bzhin gnas //
NK045(bi)005:498: snang stong zung 'jug dbu ma chen po'i tshul //
NK045(bi)005:499: 'phags pa'i gzigs ngor mi bslu don dam bden //
NK045(bi)005:500: kun rdzob gnyis snang 'khrul ba rdzun pa ste /
NK045(bi)005:501: gnas snang 'byed pa'i shes rab mig sbyin pa'i //
NK045(bi)005:502: legs bshad mchog 'di nor bu'i sgron me 'dra //
NK045(bi)005:503: de slad gzur gnas skal bzang blo ldan rnams //
NK045(bi)005:504: zab mo'i tshul 'dir lta ba'i mig sgrub ste //
NK045(bi)005:505: nges don snying po'i khang bzang la zhugs nas //
NK045(bi)005:506: rang gzhan don gnyis 'byor bas phyug par mdzod //
NK045(bi)005:507: 'dir 'bad dge 'bras ston zla gsar ba'i gzigs //
NK045(bi)005:508: snyigs lnga'i rgud pa'i tsha gdung gtan bcil zhing //
NK045(bi)005:509: thub dbang lung rtogs bstan pa'i ku muta tshal //
NK045(bi)005:510: rab rgyas rnam grol chu gter 'phel gyur cig /
NK045(bi)005:511: bdag kyang skye kun 'jam mgon bla ma yis //
NK045(bi)005:512: rjes bzung lung rigs man ngag rtsal rdzogs nas //
NK045(bi)005:513: theg mchog gangs ri'i spo la gnas bcas te //
NK045(bi)005:514: 'jigs med seng ge'i sgra dbyangs sgrogs byed shog /
NK045(bi)005:515: ces pa'ang gangs khrod smra ba'i seng ge gcig pur
NK045(bi)005:516: gyur pa rje bla ma thams cad mkhyen pa mi
NK045(bi)005:517: pham 'jam dpal dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i zhal snga nas
NK045(bi)005:518: rtsom gzhi'i sa bon tsam mdor bsdus gnang 'dug pa
NK045(bi)005:519: la / thog tha'i tshigs su bcad pa rnams rang tshig gis gsar du bsnan te /
NK045(bi)005:520: 'jam dbyangs blo gros rgya mtshos rang gnas dpal zhe
NK045(bi)005:521: chen bstan gnyis dar rgyas gling gi chos grwar zhal
NK045(bi)005:523: 'dis kyang nges don dbu ma chen po'i ring lugs
NK045(bi)005:524: phyogs thams cad du dar zhing rgyas la yun ring
NK045(bi)005:525: du gnas pa'i rgyur gyur cig /
NK045(bi)005:526: gangs can pa spyi dang khyad par rnying ma ba rnams la gdams pa bzhugs /
NK045(bi)005:527: gangs can pa spyi dang khyad par rnying ma ba rnams nyon cig /
NK045(bi)005:528: gang zag chos rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin thob pa
NK045(bi)005:529: rnams la skad cig re rer yang phyogs bcu'i sangs
NK045(bi)005:530: rgyas byang sems kyi chos kyi sgo du ma 'doms
NK045(bi)005:532: rje 'bangs sprul pa'i sku las can khyad 'phags 'ga'
NK045(bi)005:533: zhig la sangs rgyas kun 'dus pad+ma 'byung gnas kyi
NK045(bi)005:534: ye shes skus dngos su gdams pa'am /
NK045(bi)005:535: sa gter dgongs gter zer ba'i chos zab mo dus
NK045(bi)005:536: su snang ba yod pa ni sus mi khegs mod
NK045(bi)005:537: kyi / 'di 'dra'i gang zag de u du m+b+aa
NK045(bi)005:538: ra ltar dkon la yon tan che ba mi las
NK045(bi)005:539: bla mar gyur pa'i rnam thar phul byung mnga' ba
NK045(bi)005:540: zhig yin gyi su rung rung la ga la yod
NK045(bi)005:541: kyi / / des na sngar med gsar chos rnyed pa'i gang zag de tshad ldan zhig yin na /
NK045(bi)005:542: mkhyen pa'i yon tan nyams rtogs kyi gdeng tshad yod
NK045(bi)005:543: pa 'phags pa'i spyod yul du gyur pa'i chos zab
NK045(bi)005:544: mo shes sam mi shes 'dri zhing brtsad pas rtogs
NK045(bi)005:545: dgos la / brtse ba'i yon tan bstan pa la lhag bsam /
NK045(bi)005:546: 'gro ba la snying rje 'byung bas kun la ci phan mdzad pa las /
NK045(bi)005:547: chags sdang dang phrag dog rang bstod gzhan smod sogs
NK045(bi)005:548: skye bo tha mal ba'i shes rgyud kyi dri ma
NK045(bi)005:549: mi mnga' bas / ma grub grub bardzu /
NK045(bi)005:550: mi shes shes bardzu'i zog po'i rnam thar gyis 'gro la g.yo sgyu byed pa dang /
NK045(bi)005:552: bla ma mkhas grub rnams kyi lung tshad ma yid
NK045(bi)005:553: bzhin nor bu lta bu la rab thos bsam bsgom
NK045(bi)005:555: tha ma'ang gsar rnying gi chos bka' slad med re
NK045(bi)005:556: kha thon byed pa rnams skyur bcug nas mi lugs
NK045(bi)005:557: chos lugs kyi gang mtho gang gnyan gyi sar phyin
NK045(bi)005:558: nas bdag mkhas par grags par gyur na ci ma
NK045(bi)005:559: rung snyam pa'i rang gi zog chos 'di dus babs
NK045(bi)005:561: tshul ldan bslab gnas pa dag la khyod sngags pa
NK045(bi)005:562: ma byas na tshe thung zhes sdom pa 'chal du
NK045(bi)005:563: gzhug pa sogs 'gyed med la 'gyod pa bskyed pa
NK045(bi)005:564: dang / rang gi chos de'i khungs pad+ma 'byung gnas la bcol te rdzun lung gis /
NK045(bi)005:565: ga ge mo zhig ni bdud do //
NK045(bi)005:567: bud med rang la 'du na mkha' 'gro /
NK045(bi)005:569: bla ma bzang po phal che phrag dog gis bdud yin no zhe'o //
NK045(bi)005:570: rang dang nye bar yod pa'i chos byed phal mo
NK045(bi)005:571: che rang la brtsi na rje 'bangs sogs kyi sprul
NK045(bi)005:572: pa / mi brtsi na bdud kyi sprul pa /
NK045(bi)005:573: rang chos dang rang la basngagasa pa gnam sa tsam /
NK045(bi)005:574: gzhan gter ston zer ba'i zog chos rdzun gter yod tshul sogs kyis mchod 'os rig 'dzin pad+ma dang /
NK045(bi)005:575: gzhan dkon mchog gsum bslu ba ste dam par skur
NK045(bi)005:576: ba 'debs pa'i nag po'i chos bzhi po'i skyon rdul
NK045(bi)005:577: tsam med pa na brtse ba'i yon tan dpag nus
NK045(bi)005:578: shing nus pa ni gang 'brel blo sna chos la
NK045(bi)005:580: yun du brtan na dad pa je cher 'gro ba /
NK045(bi)005:581: bstan 'gro la phan pa'i phrin las che chung ci rigs 'byung ba /
NK045(bi)005:582: dus min du mthu dang dug dang ngan smras kyi mtshon cha re ba med kyang /
NK045(bi)005:583: nag phyogs kyi gdon 'dul nus shing bka' btsan byin che /
NK045(bi)005:584: phyag zhabs tshud pa tsam gyis nad sogs la phan pa dang /
NK045(bi)005:585: yul du bzhugs pa dang gang dang 'brel ba la
NK045(bi)005:586: rang skal dang bstun pa'i dge shes ci rigs 'byung
NK045(bi)005:587: ba yod na de las nus pa rtogs dgos kyi
NK045(bi)005:588: / de 'dra'i mkhyen brtse nus pa'i yon tan khyad
NK045(bi)005:589: 'phags mnga' ba'i mkhas btsun bzang po'i phrin las khyad
NK045(bi)005:590: / 'phags sam / tha na'ang rjes mthun tsam rig rgyu med par /
NK045(bi)005:591: rang gar gter ston du 'gyur na ni bon po'i
NK045(bi)005:592: rdol chos lta bu de tshig legs kyang rung yid
NK045(bi)005:594: der ma zad yon tan gyi gtso bo mkhyen brtse gnyis mi mngon na /
NK045(bi)005:595: grub rtags su rlom pa'i zhabs rjes lcags mdud brag brko /
NK045(bi)005:596: gter rdzas cha ma cho mig sngar ston pa byung
NK045(bi)005:597: yang lha 'dre'i bardzu bag can yin min the tshom
NK045(bi)005:598: gyi rgyu las ci yod de /
NK045(bi)005:599: sngon gyi gter chen mchog gnyis gling brgyad sogs gter
NK045(bi)005:600: chen snga ma dag gi gsungs 'di gter ston bdag
NK045(bi)005:602: de lta na de thams cad las zab mo'i chos gter 'byin pa dang /
NK045(bi)005:603: zog po bdud sprul gyis gter rdzun spel ba 'dra 'dres su 'ong bar bshad la /
NK045(bi)005:604: rdzun gter gang zhig bdud blon smon log rnams dang /
NK045(bi)005:605: bar snang glog ma sprin sogs bdud rigs mi ma
NK045(bi)005:606: yin rnams kyis zab mo chos la tho brtsams pa'i
NK045(bi)005:607: sa gter shog ser sogs dang dam rdzas myong grol
NK045(bi)005:608: du btags pa'i rdzas ngan khar song tshad ngan song
NK045(bi)005:610: de ga'i chos de 'phral grub rtags mngon rtags yod
NK045(bi)005:611: kyang mthar bkra mi shis la byin rlabs med pa
NK045(bi)005:612: yod pas / de'i phyir gter ston brtag dgos tshul
NK045(bi)005:613: pad+ma bka' thang sogs las rgya cher gsungs pa'i snying
NK045(bi)005:614: yod pas / po / mdo rgyud kyi lung gis grub ma grub bam /
NK045(bi)005:615: gtan tshig gi rgyas thebs ma theb /
NK045(bi)005:616: yid ches kyi gnad dang ldan mi ldan sogs rgya cher gsungs shing /
NK045(bi)005:617: de yang re zung tsam las mang po mi 'byung bar /
NK045(bi)005:619: yul gcig dus gcig gter ston gnyis mi 'byung //
NK045(bi)005:621: des na da lta dus ni je ngan /
NK045(bi)005:622: mi rnams chags sdang nyon mongs je rgod /
NK045(bi)005:623: mdo sngags kyi bshad sgrub dang skye dgu'i bde skyid ni je 'bri song ba 'di'i dus na /
NK045(bi)005:625: lo gcig gi bsnyen sgrub ma byas /
NK045(bi)005:626: mtshan ldan bla ma'i man ngag ma brten /
NK045(bi)005:628: bstan 'gro la phan sems dang 'dul sdom dam tshig gtsang ba phar zhog /
NK045(bi)005:629: dang po nas bud med yid la bcag ste phal
NK045(bi)005:630: cher de'i ched du gter ston du khas 'che ba
NK045(bi)005:631: dang / phal cher lha 'dres bslus pa'i rmi nyams
NK045(bi)005:632: sogs su gter ston gyi rnam pa cha 'dra byung
NK045(bi)005:633: dang / bas / de thabs rnyed do snyam du
NK045(bi)005:634: mngon rloms kyis nga gter ston no zhes zer ba
NK045(bi)005:635: dang / bas / dang / kha cig zhal gzigs
NK045(bi)005:636: dag snang yid ches ci yang med par lha 'dres
NK045(bi)005:637: rgyud rlom pa'i kha nas ci dran 'bod rtsom sna
NK045(bi)005:639: lung bstan yin khul sna tshogs smra ba dang /
NK045(bi)005:640: kha cig lha 'dres gzugs snang bla ma dang d+aa
NK045(bi)005:641: ki ru brdzun nas lung ston pa lta bus yid
NK045(bi)005:642: bslus nas rang rlom pa skye zhing gter ston gyi
NK045(bi)005:644: deng sang gi mi phyed gter ston yin pa 'di ci yin nam snyam du /
NK045(bi)005:645: dpyod ldan dag gis brtag par 'os la /
NK045(bi)005:646: 'di 'dra'i gter chos sna tshogs mang ba 'dis bstan 'gro la phan chen phar zhog /
NK045(bi)005:647: 'don ba po rnams la mchog thun grub pa phar zhog /
NK045(bi)005:648: kha dge bkra shis zhig byung na legs te de yang dka' tsam gda' ba ma mthong ngam /
NK045(bi)005:649: lung bstan sna tshogs slob dpon pad+ma dang /
NK045(bi)005:651: sngags kyi srung ma ral gcig ma tshe ring ma
NK045(bi)005:652: sogs kyis gsungs so zhes rtag tu mi dang mi
NK045(bi)005:653: lab ba bzhin yod pa lta bur bshad pa dang
NK045(bi)005:654: / lung bstan sna tshogs gda' ste grong khyer pa'i dga' mi dag'i gtam tsam las /
NK045(bi)005:655: snying po 'di shes 'di go dang ji bzhin de
NK045(bi)005:656: thig 'di thig ngo mtshar can ci yang mi gda'
NK045(bi)005:658: 'dra 'dra gab gab kha 'bod sna tshogs byas na
NK045(bi)005:659: rjes su cha 'dra cha 'dra thig pa lta bu
NK045(bi)005:661: de 'dra la lha dang bla ma mkha' 'gros lung bstan gyi ming thogs pa ci yang mi gda' /
NK045(bi)005:662: lung ston pa po de dag rnams kyang rang don hu thug gi 'gags la thug dus /
NK045(bi)005:663: gzhan sprang long mo ma yan chod la ci dgos dri ba las /
NK045(bi)005:664: rang gi tshe tshad skyid sdug ci 'gyur sogs shes
NK045(bi)005:665: pa'i gdeng tshad phra mo'ang mi gda' ba des blo
NK045(bi)005:666: ldan gyis dpyad na lung ston pa po'i mi rkub
NK045(bi)005:668: lhag par lung ston pa kho rang gi snang ba gang bab kyi dga' na bzang lung /
NK045(bi)005:669: ngan na ngan lung sogs smra ba mang po 'di'i lung bstan gyi mtshang gsal lam snyam ste /
NK045(bi)005:670: deng sang snyigs dus blo gros can nyung bas dpyod mkhan mi 'dug /
NK045(bi)005:671: gter ston de dag gi chos de tshad ldan zhig yin na /
NK045(bi)005:672: sangs rgyas kun 'dus o rgyan pad+mas /
NK045(bi)005:673: snod ldan gter ston de la dngos su gdams pas na /
NK045(bi)005:674: de la snod kyis mi thub par zag pa'i skyon yod pa mi rigs pas /
NK045(bi)005:675: dang por rang gis shin tu gces spras kyis gsang nas rab mchog /
NK045(bi)005:677: tha na'ang rdzun lung dang 'jig rten pa'i thabs mkhas la re mi dgos pa'i /
NK045(bi)005:678: rig ma dang zas nor 'dus pa tsam gyi dngos grub rang lag gzung 'os pa la /
NK045(bi)005:679: deng sang ni de ring chos bab dus sgrub mi
NK045(bi)005:680: dgos par gzhan la 'di thon zhes zong du brim
NK045(bi)005:681: nas / 'don mi dang spel sa zhig ma rnyed
NK045(bi)005:682: pas bskam chags 'bar ba 'adi'ang gsang sngags kyi sgrub
NK045(bi)005:683: thabs kyi lugs dang mthun mi mthun dpyad dgos so
NK045(bi)005:684: nas / // de ltar chos des gter ston kho
NK045(bi)005:685: rang yang tshe ring nad med sogs dngos grub 'di
NK045(bi)005:686: nas / // thob dang / gzhan chos bdag dang
NK045(bi)005:687: chos rgyun 'dzin pa la'ang grub pa chen po dang
NK045(bi)005:688: nas / // thob dang / / 'bring po phar zhog /
NK045(bi)005:689: sems spro ba'i mngon rtags phra mo'ang 'di byung ni
NK045(bi)005:690: dka' mo zhig las sus mthong myong mkhan dkon 'dra
NK045(bi)005:691: / des na da lta gsar rnying gnyis ka la rgyal ba'i bka' /
NK045(bi)005:693: bla ma gong ma'i man ngag dang ldan pa'i chos mdo sngags kyi nyams len /
NK045(bi)005:695: las sna tshogs kyi cho ga ci 'dod du gda' bas /
NK045(bi)005:696: chos kyi mu ge ni su la'ang mi 'dug ste /
NK045(bi)005:697: chos nyams su mi lon pa 'di 'dra ba'i dus na /
NK045(bi)005:698: gal te nyams len re 'dod na gsar chos zhig med thabs chag ci mi gda' na snyam /
NK045(bi)005:699: lhag par rnying ma pa la 'don rgyu sgrub rgyu yang /
NK045(bi)005:700: de snga 'di las lhag thos bsam gyis go rgyu /
NK045(bi)005:702: bsgoms pas myong rgyu gsang pa ci zhig 'dug /
NK045(bi)005:703: rnying pas mi phan gsar pas phan na gsar chos
NK045(bi)005:704: nyams len byed pa tshos dngos grub khyad 'phags re
NK045(bi)005:705: brnyes par mdzad na legs kyang /
NK045(bi)005:706: snga rabs pa'i dam pa gong ma'i rnam thar de
NK045(bi)005:707: 'dra'i phyogs su phyin pa yang deng sang su yang
NK045(bi)005:708: dka' / yod na ngo mtshar che ste dga' zhing yi rang ba las ci yod /
NK045(bi)005:709: lar chos des dngos su 'di phan zhig byung na
NK045(bi)005:710: des dus kyi 'tshub 'gyur sogs zhi bar smras pa
NK045(bi)005:711: lkog gyur pa sogs rigs kyi /
NK045(bi)005:712: gzhan dngos su ci yang med par lkog gyur gyi
NK045(bi)005:713: phan chen po thogs zer ba'ang the tshom gyi gnas
NK045(bi)005:714: so // mdor na o rgyan chen po'i phrin las
NK045(bi)005:715: dang sngon las kyi 'brel ba can sems can gyi
NK045(bi)005:716: mtha'i bar du mi mdzad pas der song gter ston
NK045(bi)005:718: skal ldan gyi gang zag mi srid ces skur ba
NK045(bi)005:719: 'debs pa ni nam yang ma yin te bdag gter
NK045(bi)005:720: ston dang gter chos la dad mod kyis /
NK045(bi)005:721: gter chos zer ba nyab nyob mang po dar ches
NK045(bi)005:722: na chos rnying byin rlabs can rnams kyi 'gro don
NK045(bi)005:723: sgrib pa dang / gter ston zer ba'i 'chal spyod can mang ches na /
NK045(bi)005:724: dge 'dun gyi sde gtsang ma la gnod pa dang /
NK045(bi)005:725: lung bstan zer ba'i 'chal gtam sna tshogs 'phel na
NK045(bi)005:726: chags sdang dang dam pa rnams la skur 'debs log
NK045(bi)005:727: lta'i 'tshub ma mang ba sogs gnod pa sna tshogs
NK045(bi)005:728: las / rgyal dbang pad+ma'i bstan pa mdo sngags kyi
NK045(bi)005:729: bslab bya rin po che rnams la phan cha dka'
NK045(bi)005:730: bar mthong nas chags sdang gi tshig cung zad min
NK045(bi)005:732: rang nyid gter ston par khas 'che ba dang /
NK045(bi)005:734: bsam gnas kyi mi skya pho mo tshun chad kyis legs par soms shig /
NK045(bi)005:735: des na gter ston par khas 'che ba dag gis /
NK045(bi)005:736: bdag rgyal dbang pad+ma'i zab chos 'byin pa po yin
NK045(bi)005:737: pas cis kyang rang don tshags su tshud pa dgos
NK045(bi)005:738: bsams nas / gter chos de dang por rang gis nyams su longs /
NK045(bi)005:739: des rang don grub na 'gro don ma byung yang yid tshim /
NK045(bi)005:740: 'gro don bya rgyu'i chos kyis dbul mi 'dug /
NK045(bi)005:742: khar 'chal na deng sang zog pos rgyal khams gang
NK045(bi)005:743: dus red pas dad pa bab kyang kha zer mang
NK045(bi)005:745: rang ma grub pa'i chos kyis gzhan grub dka' bas
NK045(bi)005:746: sems can rnams la phan ma thogs kyang bslu ba'i
NK045(bi)005:747: gnod pa byas na a tsa ma snyam du snying
NK045(bi)005:748: rjes zung / gzhan pa gter ston gyi chos 'don
NK045(bi)005:749: 'dod rnams kyis kyang gang zag gi tshod gang zag
NK045(bi)005:750: gis mi zin pas skur ba mi gdab /
NK045(bi)005:752: ma red bsams kyang smad ra mi byed /
NK045(bi)005:753: de bdag gis smad pas dus ngan pa'i sems can gyi las snang mi khegs /
NK045(bi)005:754: red bsams kyang bstod shes dka' ste mngon shes med pas chos rnams byin rlabs can /
NK045(bi)005:755: gu ru mkha' 'gro'i zhal lung e yin ga la shes /
NK045(bi)005:756: des na btang snyoms bzhag legs nyes pa med ces pa ltar gda' /
NK045(bi)005:757: mdor na gu ru'i gter chos zer rgyu zhig yod rgyu red mod /
NK045(bi)005:758: de ngo ma yin min gyi rgyu mtshan rnyed dka'
NK045(bi)005:759: ste gter ston pa po thog bab tu rnyed pa
NK045(bi)005:760: yin pas na / gter ston pa po de gong
NK045(bi)005:761: bshad ltar shin tu tshad ldan 'di la sems can
NK045(bi)005:762: bslu ba'i zog chos ga la yod snyam du nges
NK045(bi)005:763: pa brtan pa rnyed rgyu zhig yin na /
NK045(bi)005:764: gang zag de la mi rten pa'i sgo nas de'i chos la yid ches dgos rgyu red kyang /
NK045(bi)005:765: deng song gi gang zag phal che ba ni gong
NK045(bi)005:766: gi dam pa'i yon tan mkhyen brtse nus gsum mtshon
NK045(bi)005:767: tsam bshad pa de las go ldog lta bur mthong
NK045(bi)005:768: na des rnyed pa'i chos la gu ru'i gsung du
NK045(bi)005:770: gzhan yang rang gi rdzun zog min yang bdud dang
NK045(bi)005:771: nag phyogs kyi mthus rdzun gter yod ces gu ru
NK045(bi)005:772: nyid kyis yang yang gsungs pa dpang por byas na
NK045(bi)005:773: / gter chos zer tshad rnam dag tu sgrub dka' bas rang gis chos sgrub nus na /
NK045(bi)005:774: sgrub rgyu'i chos kyis dbul ba'i mu ge su la byung mi 'dug pas /
NK045(bi)005:775: khyi dang glo ba 'phrad pa ltar gang byung len dgos pa'i gal 'gag ci yang mi gda' bas /
NK045(bi)005:776: dge ba'i bshes gnyen rgyu 'bras kyi gnad zhib pa dang /
NK045(bi)005:777: mdo rgyud kyi don la mkhas pa nyams rtogs kyi
NK045(bi)005:778: gdeng tshad ci rigs ldan pa las chos nyan cing
NK045(bi)005:779: nyams su blang na 'tsheng ba las phung ba ci
NK045(bi)005:780: yang med nges red pas de ltar gdams pa kun
NK045(bi)005:782: blang dor dpyad pa med na lam gol 'khyams /
NK045(bi)005:783: nor la dpyad ra snyigs ma'i skye bo mkhas //
NK045(bi)005:784: chos la dpyad ra ma shes gang byung len //
NK045(bi)005:785: bdag gis gang zag gzhan la smad 'dod min //
NK045(bi)005:786: zab gter yid bzhin nor bu rnyed dka' la //
NK045(bi)005:787: chos zab pa la bdud kyang zab gsungs ltar //
NK045(bi)005:788: gter la khungs bzung 'chol nyog bstod smad kyis //
NK045(bi)005:789: chos brgyad phal mo che zhig deng song bdo //
NK045(bi)005:790: 'chal spyod grub bardzu nag chang nor rdzas sogs //
NK045(bi)005:791: 'dod pas rgyal dbang pad+mara kha g.yar nas //
NK045(bi)005:792: thos bsam mi dgos rgyu 'bras mi gzab zhing //
NK045(bi)005:793: bsnyen sgrub bsgom pa gang yang mi dgos par //
NK045(bi)005:794: rang yang nyi ma gcig gis rje 'bangs kyi //
NK045(bi)005:795: gral bsnyegs mthun phyogs phal cher der btags pa'i //
NK045(bi)005:796: thabs 'dis snga 'gyur pa yi bstan pa la //
NK045(bi)005:797: gzhan dag the tshom za ba'i 'bras bu 'grub //
NK045(bi)005:798: de phyir yang dag gter ston yin srid na //
NK045(bi)005:799: 'don cha mi dgos rang lugs lta grub kyis //
NK045(bi)005:800: gnad slong bshad sgrub bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan sgrengs //
NK045(bi)005:801: ris med bstan 'gror phan na gter lags kyi //
NK045(bi)005:802: rang basngagasa mi dgos snyan pas sa steng khyab //
NK045(bi)005:803: gter 'don mi dgos dam chos bstan pa tshugs //
NK045(bi)005:804: gal te bton kyang yid ches skye bar 'don //
NK045(bi)005:805: zong 'grim mi dgos kun gyis thob sha byed //
NK045(bi)005:806: de phyir rgyal dbang pad+ma'i bstan pa 'dis //
NK045(bi)005:807: gter ston rnams la gces pa'i nor bu yin //
NK045(bi)005:808: de slad de la sma 'bebs ma song bar //
NK045(bi)005:809: ci nas rgyan du 'gyur ba'i thabs soms shig /
NK045(bi)005:810: bstan la ma bsam rang gi log 'tsho dag /
NK045(bi)005:811: sgrub phyir blun po mgo skor gsar chos kyis //
NK045(bi)005:812: 'chad spel gang nus byed pa'i skye bo dag /
NK045(bi)005:813: pad+ma'i tha tshig yal bar bor bas nongs //
NK045(bi)005:814: lha dang rig 'dzin d+aa ki'i spyan snga ru //
NK045(bi)005:815: rgyal dbang pad+ma'i bstan la bsam dkar can //
NK045(bi)005:816: don med tha snyad tshig gi mkhas pa des //
NK045(bi)005:817: kye ma rgyal bstan rin chen bsams zhing skyo //
NK045(bi)005:818: skyo yang dus kyi snyigs mar bdag 'dra bas //
NK045(bi)005:819: phan pa'i nus pa cung zad mi 'byung mod //
NK045(bi)005:820: bden pa'i tshig la dpyod shes gzhan yod na //
NK045(bi)005:821: de dag rnams kyi rgyud la phan gyur cig /
NK045(bi)005:822: dus kyi snyigs ma mun ltar bdo na yang //
NK045(bi)005:823: rgyal dbang pad+ma'i phrin las zla ltar gsal //
NK045(bi)005:824: gsang sngags snying po'i 'od zer nyi ma ltar //
NK045(bi)005:825: gsal bas sa gsum bkra shis 'byung bar shog /
NK045(bi)005:826: ces pa'ang me rta zla 2tshes 10la 'phral dran ltar mi pham pas so //
